derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin turdus 'thrush'. Sense 2 dates from the early 19th cent. and was apparently named from the humming sound of the machine

means.word_mean: 1. a spinning machine formerly used to twist and wind fibers of cotton or wool continuously
2. common Old World thrush noted for its song

auth_sentence.content: It is also known in English dialects as throstle or mavis.
